country.name: Canada
country.government: Parliamentary democracy, federation, and constitutional monarchy
country.leader: Queen Elizabeth II; represented by Governor General David Johnston
country.exports: Motor vehicles and parts, industrial machinery, aircraft, telecommunications equipment; chemicals, plastics, fertilizers; wood pulp, timber, crude petroleum, natural gas, electricity, aluminum
country.imports: Machinery and equipment, motor vehicles and parts, crude oil, chemicals, electricity, durable consumer goods

country.name: France
country.exports: Machinery and transportation equipment, aircraft, plastics, chemicals, pharmaceutical products, iron and steel, beverages
country.imports: Machinery and equipment, vehicles, crude oil, aircraft, plastics, chemicals

country.name: Germany
country.exports: Motor vehicles, machinery, chemicals, computer and electronic products, electrical equipment, pharmaceuticals, metals, transport equipment, foodstuffs, textiles, rubber and plastic products
country.imports: Machinery, data processing equipment, vehicles, chemicals, oil and gas, metals, electric equipment, pharmaceuticals, foodstuffs, agricultural products

country.name: Italy
country.exports: Engineering products, textiles and clothing, production machinery, motor vehicles, transport equipment, chemicals; food, beverages and tobacco; minerals, nonferrous metals
country.imports: Engineering products, chemicals, transport equipment, energy products, minerals and nonferrous metals, textiles and clothing; food, beverages, and tobacco

country.name: Japan
country.government: Parliamentary government with a constitutional monarchy
country.exports: Motor vehicles, semiconductors, iron and steel products, auto parts, plastic materials, power generation machinery
country.imports: Petroleum, liquid natural gas, clothing, semiconductors, coal, audio and visual apparatus

country.name: United Kingdom
country.exports: Manufactured goods, fuels, chemicals; food, beverages, tobacco

country.name: United States
country.government: Constitution-based federal republic; strong democratic tradition
country.exports: Agricultural products, industrial supplies, capital goods, consumer goods
country.imports: Agricultural products, industrial supplies, capital goods, consumer goods

country.name: Russia
country.exports: Petroleum and petroleum products, natural gas, metals, wood and wood products, chemicals, and a wide variety of civilian and military manufactures
country.imports: Machinery, vehicles, pharmaceutical products, plastic, semi-finished metal products, meat, fruits and nuts, optical and medical instruments, iron, steel

country.name: Democratic Republic of Congo
country.exports: Diamonds, copper, gold, cobalt, wood products, crude oil, coffee
country.imports: Foodstuffs, mining and other machinery, transport equipment, fuels

country.name: Equatorial Guinea
country.leader: Brig. Gen. (Ret.) Teodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo
country.imports: Petroleum sector equipment, other equipment, construction materials, vehicles

country.name: Eritrea
country.exports: Livestock, sorghum, textiles, food, small manufactures
country.imports: Machinery, petroleum products, food, manufactured goods

country.name: Haiti
country.exports: Apparel, manufactures, oils, cocoa, mangoes, coffee
country.imports: Food, manufactured goods, machinery and transport equipment, fuels, raw materials

country.name: Madagascar
country.exports: Coffee, vanilla, shellfish, sugar, cotton cloth, clothing, chromite, petroleum products
country.imports: Capital goods, petroleum, consumer goods, food

country.name: Swaziland
country.exports: Soft drink concentrates, sugar, wood pulp, cotton yarn, refrigerators, citrus and canned fruit
country.imports: Motor vehicles, machinery, transport equipment, foodstuffs, petroleum products, chemicals

country.name: Zimbabwe
country.exports: Platinum, cotton, tobacco, gold, ferroalloys, textiles/clothing
country.imports: Machinery and transport equipment, other manufactures, chemicals, fuels, food products
